H0.text: Who, in the Bible, was the eldest son of Isaac. Abraham

H1.text: Who, in the Bible, was the eldest son of Isaac. Ishmael

H2.text: Who, in the Bible, was the eldest son of Isaac. Jacob

H3.text: Who, in the Bible, was the eldest son of Isaac. Esav

A4.text: Isaac's sons were Jacob and Esau

A5.text: Esau is the elder son of Isaac in the Hebrew Bible

A6.text: Of the twins, Esau was the first to be born with Jacob following, holding his heel
